item.title: scrape book deals of the day
item.author: leledavid@gmail.com
item.description: Often I come across some websites that have free e-book deals each day or once in a while. Sometimes I’m lucky and it’s currently some title or topic I am interested in, but usually it’s some topic I have absolutely no clue about (“Learning Linux Binary Analysis”). However, you never know! Tomorrow or maybe in 18 days time there might be something on exactly the topic you are curious about!
